summary: Teaches the move Dig, a two-turn Ground-type physical attack (80 power, 100 accuracy) that allows the user to avoid most moves on the first turn.
typical_users: Physical attackers needing Ground coverage (e.g., Garchomp, Tyranitar, Excadrill)
Pokémon to counter Electric, Poison, Rock, Steel, and Fire types
Teams requiring a semi-invulnerable turn for scouting or stalling
